text.__SUMMARY__:
Millettia capuronii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Madagascar.
text.Sources: Du Puy, D. & Labat, H. (1998). "Millettia capuronii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36233A9990156. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36233A9990156.en. Retrieved 21 December 2017.
